divs: sighting detailsi was leaving my friends apartment around 10:00 pm on 4\11\12 located in rochester hills, michigan . i was looking up at the star filled sky and noticed a very bright almost round shaped object that would go from a glow to a strong brightness sometimes change shape and occasional green and red lights would appear. i immediately got into my van - as i tried to start my van the side back seat doors opened and closed by themselves before the van was even started. this made me a bit nervous. drove to my home in rochester, mi about 15-20 minutes from my friends apartment. i kept my eye on the object the whole drive home. when arriving home my husband and 2 teenage sons (14 & 17) went outside with binoculars. the kids who have been non-believers in the past and having better eyes observed more detail. they also saw the object change shape and brightness levels along with the red and green occasional lights appear. but what they could also see was a light tail appearing from the bottom of the object and windows. also present in the night sky was 3 faint red\pink round shapes that did not move. there were commercial airplanes flying higher then ufos . we observed the objects until 10:45 pm - it was cold and getting late for bed. i observed the object off and on from house window until 11:30pm. thought i heard a helicopter fly by around this time - but could not spot. checked one more time at 12:00 am and sky was completely cloudy. when getting up at 6:00 am next day, 4\12\12, only saw half moon with a clear sky. my husband reaction was of amazement and feels comfortable. he also has seen the same 3 ufos i saw over the last 2 years. the kids were also amazed but embarrassed as it sound like we are nut cases. i am usually the one who first sees ufo"s, third in 2 years. so it makes me a bit uncomfortable. i am very intuitive with people. the part about the van doors was eerie - at first i thought someone had hid in my parked van or just jumped in - gave me the creeps. my son tried to video and take pictures with his high powered camera - but too far away.
Summary: Saw stationary bright glowing object that would change shape slightly with occasional red and green lights. Also in the sky filled with many stars were 3 faint red/pink round lights. re 3 other soft pink
